title: Editor UI Panels (Tool Palette + Color Picker)

criteria.text: ui_panels.rs exists with ToolPalette, PropertyPanel, HsvColorPicker types
Tool palette (left side) shows icons for each tool in the current stage with keyboard shortcuts
Selected tool is visually highlighted in the palette
Property panel (right side) shows stage-specific sliders
PropertyPanel::rebuild_for_stage() creates appropriate sliders when stage changes
HSV color picker renders SV box (128x128) + hue bar for Stage 4
Clicking/dragging SV box updates saturation and value
Recent colors shows 8 swatches below the picker
All UI rendering uses add_quad() and draw_text() from src/game/ui/text.rs
cargo check --bin battle_editor passes with 0 errors
cargo check --bin battle_arena passes with 0 errors

verification_commands.cmd: cd /home/hungaromakker/battle_tok && cargo check --bin battle_editor 2>&1; echo EXIT:$?
verification_commands.description: battle_editor binary compiles with ui_panels module

verification_commands.cmd: cd /home/hungaromakker/battle_tok && cargo check --bin battle_arena 2>&1; echo EXIT:$?

verification_commands.description: Core UI panel types are defined
Uses add_quad and draw_text for rendering

checklist.item: Create src/game/asset_editor/ui_panels.rs with ToolPalette struct and per-stage tool lists
Implement tool palette rendering with add_quad() and draw_text()
Implement PropertyPanel with stage-specific slider configurations
Implement rebuild_for_stage() to update sliders on stage change
Implement HsvColorPicker with SV box, hue bar, opacity slider, recent colors
Implement click/drag handling for all panel interactions
Wire ui_panels module into mod.rs and render as overlay
Run cargo check --bin battle_editor and cargo check --bin battle_arena
